www.alternet.org/maga-epstein...

Gretchen Carlson warned that if Trump pardons Epstein’s fixer, Ghislaine Maxwell, even MAGA hats might catch fire. Turns out there's a limit to who you can pardon—child sex traffickers might finally be a PR misstep.

#Trump #fascism #MAGA #Project2025

posts.text:
What is there to say about the trade deal the EU reached with the Trump regime? 15% tariffs and over $1.3 trillion in investment and purchase commitments? On what planet is that a "deal"? Kudos to Canada's Mark Carney for holding out.
#trump #cdnpoli
